globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
"Well, we never expected this to be easy..." one of the Rebel pilots groans as she points out approaching Imperial troops on the scanner. You rush to your family and friends, ensuring that they're well into the process of boarding the convoy, before seizing your weapons and moving to defend your position.

{-} Deploy the Rebels to any spaces on the Hangar (blue highlight).
{-} Doors are locked. A door adjacent to a Rebel figure does not block movement, line of sight, adjacency, or counting spaces. An Imperial figure can attack a door (Health: 10, Defense: 2 {G}).

eventActions.theText: {-} Imperial figures target doors if a door is between the figure and its target.
A couple of emergency medpacks are stored in the hangar. This is going to come in handy - you won't have much time to take proper care of your wounds.

entityProperties.name: Medpack 1
entityProperties.theText:
An emergency medpack is stored on a shelf in the corner of the hangar.

{-} Rebel mission tokens represent unused medpacks. Imperial mission tokens represent used medpacks. During his activation, a hero on or adjacent to an unused medpack can flip that medpack and test {J} to recover 6 {C} plus 1 {C} for each success. For each {C} he recovers above 0, he recovers 1 {H}.
{-} Each time a hero performs a rest, click any medpack and select "Hero rests" to increase {D} by 2. After Round 4, heroes cannot recover {H} while performing a rest.
{-} When there are no healthy heroes on the Hangar (blue highlight), click any medpack and select "No healthy heroes".

entityProperties.name: Medpack 2
entityProperties.theText:
An emergency medpack is stored on a shelf in the corner of the hangar.

{-} Rebel mission tokens represent unused medpacks. Imperial mission tokens represent used medpacks. During his activation, a hero on or adjacent to an unused medpack can flip that medpack and test {J} to recover 6 {C} plus 1 {C} for each success. For each {C} he recovers above 0, he recovers 1 {H}.
{-} Each time a hero performs a rest, click any medpack and select "Hero rests" to increase {D} by 2. After Round 4, heroes cannot recover {H} while performing a rest.
{-} When there are no healthy heroes on the Hangar (blue highlight), click any medpack and select "No healthy heroes".

eventActions.theText:
{-} Rebel mission tokens represent unused medpacks. Imperial mission tokens represent used medpacks. During his activation, a hero on or adjacent to an unused medpack can flip that medpack and test {J} to recover 6 {C} plus 1 {C} for each success. For each {C} he recovers above 0, he recovers 1 {H}.
{-} Each time a hero performs a rest, click any medpack and select "Hero rests" to increase {D} by 2. After Round 4, heroes cannot recover {H} while performing a rest.
{-} When there are no healthy heroes on the Hangar (blue highlight), click any medpack and select "No healthy heroes".
As you move out into the twin sunlight, a shadow passes overhead and you look up to see Jabba’s ship, the Khetanna, making its landing nearby. Soon, the Hutt's mercenaries advance toward the hangar.
The same Alliance pilot hails you on your comlink again: "You guys sure know how to make friends out here..." As if on cue, Imperial soldiers appear over the sand dunes.

You move into defensive position, ready to hold out as long as you have to.

{-} The Rebels win at the end of Round 5.
{-} The Rebels lose when there are no healthy heroes on the Hangar.

{-} Rebel mission tokens represent unused medpacks. Imperial mission tokens represent used medpacks. During his activation, a hero on or adjacent to an unused medpack can flip that medpack and test {J} to recover 6 {C} plus 1 {C} for each success. For each {C} he recovers above 0, he recovers 1 {H}.
{-} Each time a hero performs a rest, click any medpack and select "Hero rests" to increase {D} by 2. After Round 4, heroes cannot recover {H} while performing a rest.
{-} When there are no healthy heroes on the Hangar (blue highlight), click any medpack and select "No healthy heroes".
{-} Doors are locked. A door adjacent to a Rebel figure does not block movement, line of sight, adjacency, or counting spaces. An Imperial figure can attack a door (Health: 10, Defense: 2 {G}).
{-} The Rebels win at the end of Round 5.
{-} The Rebels lose when there are no healthy heroes on the Hangar.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
Though the lines of enemies continue to press in, you hold your ground and keep the Rebel convoy safe from their onslaught. Amidst the sound of battle, you finally hear the deep rumble of the convoy's ships blasting off into space. "They're clear!" Luke shouts. "Let's get out of here!" You fall back together, Luke continuing to provide cover by deflecting blaster bolts back into oncoming assailants.

After you find safe space and recover, you contact the convoy and are able to speak to your family. "Thank you," they say to you. "We know we'll be safe now. Please get here soon, and we can be all together again."

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Each hero receives 2 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.
{-} If <color="red">Captain Terro</color> was not defeated, increase the threat level of the next mission (and only the next mission) by 1. During the Rebel Upgrade stage, the Rebel players can decide to spend 50 credits per hero to prevent this.
{-} Place Story Mission card "Almost Home" into play.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
Your endurance finally gives out, and the horde of enemies breaks your defensive line. On the other side of the battlefield, you see Luke forced into retreat under a barrage of stormtrooper fire. Your comlink crackles with calls for help. You sprint back into the hangar trying to defend as best as you can, Eventually, the convoy is able to take off, and you make a hasty retreat.

Once safe, you contact the convoy and speak to the captain. “We're away” he says, “but we suffered some heavy losses, both soldiers and civilians. You be happy to know your families are safe. We need to finish this mission soon; we can't take more losses."

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.
{-} If <color="red">Luke Skywalker</color> was not defeated, heroes receive 25 credits per hero.
{-} Place Story Mission card "Almost Home" into play.

globalEvents.name: Medpack Used 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You quickly grab the medical supplies and patch yourself up.

{-} Test {J}. You recover 6 {C} plus 1 {C} for each success.

globalEvents.name: Hero Rests
globalEvents.eventText:
You take a few moments to catch your breath, but this is time your enemies will use against you.

{-} {D} has increased.

entityProperties.name: Door 1
entityProperties.theText:
A security door protects the hangar from the onslaught of your enemies - for now.

{-} The door is locked. A door adjacent to a Rebel figure does not block movement, line of sight, adjacency, or counting spaces. An Imperial figure can attack a door (Health: 10, Defense: 2 {G}).

entityProperties.theText:
A security door protects the hangar from the onslaught of your enemies - for now.

globalEvents.name: Pressing In
globalEvents.eventText:
Landing ships and skiffs are approaching from the distance. Jabba's mercenaries and Captain Terro's soldiers are getting closer. Soon you will be overwhelmed.

{-} At the end of each Round, deployment points move closer to the Hangar.

entityProperties.name: Token Merc 2-1
entityProperties.theText:
Jabba's forces are advancing towards the hangar.

{-} {W} figures can deploy to this token.

entityProperties.name: Token Merc 3-1
entityProperties.theText:
Jabba's forces are advancing towards the hangar.

{-} {W} figures can deploy to this token.

globalEvents.name: Heroes and Villains
globalEvents.eventText:
The Imperials and mercenaries continue to flood in from all directions as their commanders shout orders.

In the distance, you see the telltale spurt of flame that signals the arrival of Terro, the dewback-riding stormtrooper captain.

eventActions.theText: At the same time, you see the bulbous form of Jabba the Hutt emerge on the bridge of the Khetanna, giving commands to his underlings.

The blaster fire grows more intense as the heat of the suns becomes more unbearable, when the roar of a transport shuttle landing in the hangar catches your attention. You turn to see Luke Skywalker emerge, smiling a crooked grin.

"Command thought this mission was worth a little extra help," he says to you, smiling. He looks around at the scope of the battle and says, “I see we need it. With a snap and a hum, he ignites a green-glowing lightsaber. "May the Force be with you," he calls, then leaps into battle.

globalEvents.name: Final Onslaught
globalEvents.eventText:
"We're almost done!", the Alliance pilot shouts. "Just hold them off for a little longer!" As if sensing the impending departure, your enemies surge forward.

{-} Heroes cannot recover {H} while performing a rest.
